app.title: The Most Annoying Website
app.description: Self-proclaimed most annoying website on the web with so many disgusting features of modern websites you might even vomit at some point.
app.recruiting: Want to extend what you see here? Visit our <linkTag>GitHub</linkTag> repo to get started.
app.aiDisclose: AI text and image generation was used to produce contents of this website.
app.dataStorageDisclaimer: We don't store any form data of: newsletter subscriptions, login, signup, password reminder.
app.cookieConsent: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. It's also a joke so many of the features are buggy or doens't even work on purpose. You can customize your experience and cookie settings in the settings menu.

donate.description:
This project doesn't have any sponsor, sugardaddy, sugarmommy, crypto-whale investor, bored millionaire, or mysterious trench-coat philanthropist. It runs purely on volunteer work, server bills, and a steady stream of kebab + coffee expenses ‚Äî all of which only dig the financial hole deeper. Still, this app remains a love project.



If you want to support our cause and help make this website even worse, any amount is HIGHLY appreciated. If you don't have money to spare ‚Äî honestly, who does in this economy? ‚Äî you can still help by sharing this app and spreading the annoyance further.
donate.moneyUsageDescription: Your support helps compensate the time and effort I put into development, and it also contributes to covering infrastructure and tool costs (such as hosting, services, and development tools). Donations simply help keep the project alive and sustainable. Let's put money into the jar!
donate.topSupportersDescription: Once this project actually starts getting donations, real people will appear here. So if you wish to be part of this list please contact me so that I can either manually upgrade this page or figure out some mechanism to do so.
donate.alternativeOptionsLink: Click here for other means of supporting üòè
donate.disclaimerDetails:
This project is developed by a private individual based in Hungary. Any financial support or donation‚Äî including crypto‚Äîis voluntary, final, and does not grant you any rights, services, or special access. Donations are not tax-deductible.



No legal, tax, or financial advice is provided. If you have questions about donating or your own tax obligations, please consult a qualified professional in your jurisdiction.



I comply with applicable Hungarian tax laws for any funds received.

app.exitPrompt: I'd reconsider leaving before some bad things happend to you. Are you sure?

virgin.title: Disable all experiences
virgin.description: All experiences are disabled now. If you want share this page just for the content just pass this URL around. If you changed your mind, you can re-enable all experiences in the settings menu.

messages.catJudging: My imaginary cat is judging me. She knows I can't afford the fancy treats anymore. Help me restore my dignity (and her opinion of me).
messages.rentDue: The rent is due. My landlord thinks I'm "creative" with payment schedules. Last month I paid in interpretive dance. I need actual money now.
messages.codeTherapy: My code needs therapy. It's held together by duct tape, prayers, and Stack Overflow answers from 2012. Help me pay for AI agents.
messages.futureSelf: Past me made commitments that current me can't afford. Future me is going to be very disappointed. Help me lie to myself more convincingly.
messages.pretendSuccessful: Just for one day, I want to buy something without checking my bank balance first. Your donation makes dreams come true. Sad, materialistic dreams.
messages.validationNeeded: My therapist says I seek external validation too much. But what does she know? She's not the one staring at zero donations. Prove her wrong.
messages.ramenUpgrade: I want to upgrade my ramen. From "3 for ‚Ç¨5" to "fancy instant with vegetable packet included." It's a modest dream. A noodle-based dream.

app.title: The Most Annoying Website
app.description: Self-proclaimed most annoying website on the web with so many disgusting features of modern websites you might even vomit at some point.

about.title: About us
about.description: Discover the story behind this website, its origins, and the passionate creators and contributors who bring it to life.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a question, suggestion, or just want to say hello? Reach out to us here and we'll be happy to connect.

dilf.title: DILF - Donut I'd Like to Feast On
dilf.description: An irresistibly sweet concept that combines indulgence with fun. Find out more here.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Your support makes a world of difference! Contribute here to help us continue creating amazing experiences.

wanPhone.title: Flaim a phone
wanPhone.description: Ready for some fiery fun? Flaim a phone here and see how we bring the heat to your mobile experience.

hotThings.title: Hot things
hotThings.description: Discover the hottest trends, ideas, and creations we're passionate about. Explore all the sizzling content here.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: We value your privacy. Read our Privacy Policy here to learn how we protect your personal information and data.

search.title: Search
search.description: Looking for something specific? Search here to quickly find exactly what you're looking for, no matter where it is on our site.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize your experience to suit your preferences. Explore the settings here and make everything just the way you like it.

userLogin.title: Login
userLogin.description: Welcome back! Log in here to access your personalized content and all the features exclusive to you.

userPasswordReminder.title: Password Reminder
userPasswordReminder.description: Forgot your password? Don't worry! Use the Password Reminder feature here to quickly get back on track.

userSignup.title: Signup
userSignup.description: Join our community today! Signup here to unlock a world of exclusive content and personalized experiences.

userProfile.title: Profile
userProfile.description: Manage your account and preferences here. Update your profile information and settings to make it truly yours.

virgin.title: Disable all experiences
virgin.description: Looking for a no-frills experience? Disable all personalized features here and enjoy a streamlined, distraction-free version of our site.

captcha.captchaEmojiHint: Count the emojis and identify which one appears the most. Look carefully, as parts of some emojis might be obscured.
captcha.captchaTilePuzzleHint: Slide the tiles into their right position. You can only move the ones directly next to each other.

error.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error.impossiblePath: It is impossible to get here, there must be an error. Feel free to try again.
error.max: Value must be no more than {count}
error.patternMismatch: The input does not match the required pattern
error.fileTooLarge: The file size exceeds the limit of {size}
error.missingUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
error.missingLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
error.missingNumber: Must contain at least one number
error.missingSpecialCharacter: Must contain at least one symbol
error.sumOfNumbersGte: Sum of numbers must be at least or equal to {count}
error.sumOfNumbersMustBeEven: Sum of numbers must be be even
error.passwordAlreadyTaken: The password is already taken by another user

runtime.title: About this session

modal.title: Share this page
modal.description: Spread the misery! Be sure to inflict this painfully obnoxious website on your friends too ‚Äî why suffer alone when you can drag them down with you?

modal.title: You can manually change the notification permission up here
modal.description: We would like to send you notifications sometimes, could you be so kind to allow us to do so? üôèü•∫üôè

modal.title: Join our newsletter!
modal.description: Our premium newsletter brings an insane amount of value right to your inbox. Don't miss out on insights that make a real difference!
modal.useFormActions: Please use the relevant button instead

confirmation_001.text: We're disappointed to see that you may not have had enough time to fully consider this important and challenging decision.
confirmation_001.confirm: I thought about it, I still want to

confirmation_002.text: We are sorry to see you subscribing, can we treat you with the joys of not being a subscriber at all?

confirmation_003.text: Have you considered skipping this newsletter?

confirmation_004.text: Subscribing to this newsletter might have adverse side effects. Are you still in?

overlay.title: You either gotta pay $0.69/hour with 24 months of commitment in order to see the next paragraph or need to keep clicking the secondary button.
overlay.disclaimer: it might not be as secure and legit but that doesn't matter because you can't actually pay on this website.
overlay.cancel: Give me free stuff for free

dilf.title: DILF
dilf.fullTitle: DILF - Donut I'd Like to Feast On
dilf.description: If you're searching for the tastiest, hottest, singlest and most irresistible donuts in your area, you're in the perfect place. Are you ready to take on the challenge of finding your true love? Click on any of the donuts here to discover which one is meant for you.
dilf.flapLeft: DILF. Hot single donuts in your area
dilf.flapRight: DILF. Tastiest donuts in your proximity

wanPhone.title: Congratulations! You've wan a phone! Flaim now!

survey.description: Fill out this quick survey and you might have a chance to flaim your new phone! Be precise and quick but not too quick.

lost.text: Sorry, looks like you have not finished the survey in time.

cheatDetected.text: Cheating detected! You are not allowed to flaim your phone.

completed.text: Thank you for participating! Unfortunatelly phone cannot be flaimed at this time.

variant_002.text: What is the most common favorite color?

variant_003.text: It has four legs, it's not a chair but a table

variant_004.text: What is the square root of 144?

variant_005.text: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?

variant_006.text: Finish the following: Well, well, well...

options.option_003: It's down there somewhere, let me take another look

variant_007.text: What is the following is not a phone brand

variant_008.text: What is the first letter of the alphabet?

suspectBar.title: Adblocker suspected!
suspectBar.description: It looks like you're using an ad blocker. That's a bit odd, innit? You're missing out big time! Please consider turning it off. Until then, you'll see this huge red banner at the bottom every time you visit this site. And please don't close it using the OK button, either. Cheers!

chatBubble.messageInitial: Hello! I am a chat bubble. I am here to help you. ü§ì

messageVariants.variant_001: Come on, let me help you!
messageVariants.variant_002: I can't hear you! Speak louder!
messageVariants.variant_004: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues.
messageVariants.variant_005: Sorry, I'm going through a tunnel right now. Can you repeat that?
messageVariants.variant_006: You must have missed my previous messages. I'm kind of lonely.
messageVariants.variant_007: Wondering if my messages got caught in a time warp. Feeling like I'm at a party where everyone's speaking Simlish.
messageVariants.variant_008: My messages must be on a ghosting spree. Feeling ignored.
messageVariants.variant_009: Ah, the sweet sound of silence. My messages must be enjoying their newfound solitude.

chatBubble.hudTitleDisclaimer: Disclaimer: Actually, this is a bot that almost feels like a real human (not a smart one) but it's still just a bot
